mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_PW , MEM_ROLE , MEM_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_EMAIL = #{memEmail}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_STATUS = CASE WHEN WARNING_CNT >= 9 THEN 'BANNED' WHEN MOD(WARNING_CNT, 3) = 0 THEN 'BANNED' ELSE 'WARNING' END , BANNED_UNTIL = STR_TO_DATE(#{bannedUntil}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') WHERE MEM_ID = #{reportedId}
mapper.select: SELECT M.MEM_STATUS , M.BANNED_UNTIL , M.WARNING_CNT , S.SANCTION_REASON , S.SANCTION_TYPE FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SANCTION_REASON , SANCTION_TYPE , MEM_ID FROM ( SELECT SANCTION_REASON , SANCTION_TYPE , MEM_ID , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY MEM_ID ORDER BY START_DATE DESC) AS rn FROM SANCTION ) T WHERE T.rn = 1 ) S ON M.MEM_ID = S.MEM_ID WHERE M.MEM_ID = #{memId}
SELECT MEM_ID , MEM_STATUS , BANNED_UNTIL FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'BANNED' AND BANNED_UNTIL IS NOT NULL AND BANNED_UNTIL <= #{now}
